description: This former 18C mill, located in the centre of a tiny medieval district on the outskirts of Uliveto Terme, boasts a warm, elegant ambience full of character. Expertly run by the same family for the past 35 years, it serves honest, traditional cuisine with a focus on regional recipes and an equal balance of meat and fish.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
